title: nbc typeface
content:
tuned into heroes this week and noticed nbc has dropped antenna in favor of something else. i couldn't place it on-screen. i thought it was kind of close to kievit, but after looking at it in use in the headers on their site i can see it's something else. any help on this one?

[http://www.nbc.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110809150219/http:/www.nbc.com/ "http://www.nbc.com/")
author: johndiggity

comments.content:
Updated (improved) Houschka Pro actually.

Nick Cooke
